channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pavement is very uneven, 17th September
item.description:
This uneven pavement is making life very difficult for our village residents with limited mobility who need to use a walker.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Andoversford, Cotswold

item.title: Returning potholes, 17th September
item.description:
This has been refilled at a cost of thousands so many times but is coming back, just in time for the winter months. There are more fillings than a Victorian dentist. It’s about time this section of road is resurfaced and the drainage from the field sorted.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Collapsing road, 17th September
item.description:
Before the junction just before turning left for churchdown from shurdington, there have been roadworks. What ever is under the works is in the process of collapsing. This is entirely across the road. It has been slowly getting worse. It’s now not avoidable and is going to cause damage again.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 17th September
item.description:
Parking sign is leaning been like it for months and appears to be getting worse and would like it checked
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)

item.title: There is a bed base dumped opposite 3 Cromwell Rd Cheltenham which is dangerous..it tips over and obstructs the pavement. It has been there at least a month. Most annoying..an eyesore., 17th September
item.description:
Next to the new townhouses opposite 3 Cromwell Rd Cheltenham.. it's damp and mouldy..heavy and dangerous..
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Cromwell Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 17th September
item.description:
Cut back approx 3m of shrubs growing out of base of tree on roundabout centre - 28 days - Standard TM as space for gang to work safety on roundabout centre. (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is a Tesco shopping trolley in the next driveway to us ..has been dumped here which is annoying., 17th September
item.description:
The Tesco shopping trolley has been here a week. Tesco's is a long way from here... very annoying. We are 3 Cromwell Road Cheltenham. Also there is a big bed base going rotten and mildrew opposite us next to the modern townhouses. We have spoken to the neighbour ..he took away the bed stead but left the base. It's a danger because it falls down and obstructs the pavement opposite me when I take the dog for my a walk. Very annoying as it's been there for a month.... both trolley and bed base are an eyesore to the neighbourhood ....
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Cromwell Road, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
